title: Journal of Health and Social Behavior - Adverse Childhood Experiences, Early and Nonmarital Fertility, and Women's Health at Midlife
description: Authors Kristi Williams and Brian Finch discuss their article, "Adverse Childhood Experiences, Early and Nonmarital Fertility, and Women's Health at Midlife." The article is published in the September 2019 issue of the Journal of Health and Social Behavior.
content:encoded: Authors Kristi Williams and Brian Finch discuss their article, "Adverse Childhood Experiences, Early and Nonmarital Fertility, and Women's Health at Midlife." The article is published in the September 2019 issue of the Journal of Health and Social Behavior.
itunes:subtitle: An American Sociological Association Podcast
